import React from 'react' //i am comment import placeholder from '../../../assets/png/placeholder.png' import './SingleBlog.css' function SingleBlog({ theme, title, desc, date, image, url, id }) { return ( <>

{date}

{title}

{desc}
 ) } export default SingleBlog
